title: Former Bachelorette Andi Dorfman
description:
The one and only Andi Dorfman is here! Andi, Rachel and Becca talk about Clare’s upcoming season, and Andi reveals the best and worst things about her time on the show. Then, Andi discusses how and why she started her Andorfins running club. 

Plus, Andi reveals whether or not she’d say yes to being the Bachelorette again if she were asked. 

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode! 

Thanks to our sponsors: 

Firstleaf: TryFirstleaf.com/Bachelor 

Chrysler: PacificaHappyHour.com
